channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12341] LLAP: add security to daemon protocol endpoint (excluding shuffle)
item.summary: LLAP: add security to daemon protocol endpoint (excluding shuffle)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Backup WIP patches. Client can talk to LLAP, AM can talk to LLAP, query starts, the current problem is that heartbeat cannot talk back, even with job token

2015-11-13 01:15:04,212 [INFO] [Socket Reader #1 for port 36751] |ipc.Server|: Socket Reader #1 for port 36751: readA
ndProcess from client 240.0.0.11 threw exception [org.apache.hadoop.security.authorize.AuthorizationException: Protoc
ol interface org.apache.hadoop.hive.llap.protocol.LlapTaskUmbilicalProtocol is not known.

PolicyProvider needs to be added for this too probably. Or something.
gopalv sseth fyi

With this patch, I can run a query not involving a shuffle successfully; I can also run a query with shuffle but it cannot write to a local FS, and after chmod 777 it cannot run because my cluster doesn't have native Hadoop set up, so I didn't bother with that much.
Sid told me that currently LLAP shuffle doesn't use tokens at all, so it does appear to get to the point where the request is being processed. I assume shuffle security would be added there and other shuffle issues resolved, in HIVE-12397.

gopalv sseth can you review? RB w/o the generated code at https://reviews.apache.org/r/40315/

ATTACHMENT ID: 12772567 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
vikram.dixit maybe you can review?
Addressed the RB comments. sseth can you take a look at Tez credentials transfer in particular, does that change make sense? I will set up a test for it later if all should be good.
Sorry, please diff revisions 2 and 5 on RB, 3 contains generated code and in 4 I forgot a file 0_o
Small fix to retry logic
Addressed the feedback. The main change is separating the protocols. I hope they can work in the same class, need to test.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12774455 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Addressing the latest RB feedback.
+1 for the configuration parameters. Thanks for the changes.
Fixing the bugs in the latest patch based on cluster testing.

sseth https://reviews.apache.org/r/40315/diff/2-8/ are the changes since you last reviewed I think... or maybe https://reviews.apache.org/r/40315/diff/5-8/

Main changes are - LlapIoProxy was renamed, protocols were split, and the change to how the token is propagated to Tez AM (via credentials rather than a config string).

ATTACHMENT ID: 12775949 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Two nits (method name and a constant value) were fixed on commit. Here's the final patch.
Committed to all the relevant branches.

Doc note: Adding a TODOC2.1 label but not a TODOC2.0 label, because in branch-2.0 the only change to HiveConf.java parameters is relocation within the file. (sershe, is that correct?)

Here are the new configs in master that will need wiki documentation for 2.1.0:

  • hive.llap.daemon.service.principal (but I don't understand why it's coded as public static final, unlike other parameters – see HIVE_LLAP_DAEMON_SERVICE_PRINCIPAL_NAME on lines 222 and 2389)
  • hive.llap.daemon.keytab.file
  • hive.llap.zk.sm.principal
  • hive.llap.zk.sm.keytab.file
  • hive.llap.zk.sm.connectionString
  • hive.llap.daemon.service.acl
  • hive.llap.management.service.acl
  • hive.llap.daemon.delegation.token.lifetime
  • hive.llap.management.rpc.port
Hmm, no, the changes should be the same in master and branch-2.0. Let me double check...
As far as I see, commit 2d2562c4c5e9d59642798cd553f7c36a346d7002 on branch-2.0 adds the parameters too.
You're right, gmail hid those changes in a subtle ellipsis ("...") so I didn't see them. Thanks for setting me straight, sershe.
Changed the TODOC2.1 label to TODOC2.0 after Sergey verified that all new configs are in release 2.0.0.
HIVE-12813 changes the names of hive.llap.daemon.service.acl and hive.llap.management.service.acl to hive.llap.daemon.acl and hive.llap.management.acl, respectively, in releases 2.0.0 and 2.1.0+.

Doc Done:

  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.daemon.service.principal
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.daemon.keytab.file
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.zk.sm.principal
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.zk.sm.keytab.file
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.zk.sm.connectionString
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.daemon.acl
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.management.acl
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.daemon.delegation.token.lifetime
  • Configuration Properties - hive.llap.management.rpc.port

TODOC label removed.
